Daredevil.description: Turn Start: Gain 1 Clash Power. Gain +1.5 to all resistances (Caps at 2), deal 150% more damage with all offensive dice. Turn End: Take Fixed Damage equal to 15% of this unit’s max HP. Reduce stack by 1 at turn end.

Noise.description: Max Stack 6. Turn Start: Gain Sinking and Sinking count equal to (Stack * 2). If this unit has not received Noise this turn, gain 1 Stack next scene. At max stack, become forcibly staggered.

Overstimulated.description: Max 3. When this unit has this status effect; inflict +1 additional Burn and gain +1 Charge  Count with page effects. When first gaining this status effect, draw the page “Bomb Disposal!”. If the unit has “Bomb Disposal!” before this status effect runs out, use “IT’S GONNA BLOW!!” next scene.

ThornArrow.description: Unique Ammo, Max 10. Only consumed by certain pages. Doesn't decay.

Congealing Wound.description:
- Max Stack 2.
- Gain 5 Bleed
- At 2+ Stack, gain (X * 10) Bleed Potency and Count

The Hounds Tarnished Jaws.description:
- Max Stack 2.
- Gain 5 Bleed
- At 2+ Stack, gain (X * 10) Bleed Potency and Count

Bloodtipped Bone Arrow.description: Unique Ammo, Max 3. Only consumed by certain pages. Doesn't decay.

Spinalcord Ripped Arrow.description: Unique Ammo, Max 3. Only consumed by certain pages. Doesn't decay.

Echoes of the Manor.description:
- Max Stack: 3. 
- When gaining Sinking, 50% chance to gain +1 Sinking Count.
- Turn End: Lower by 1

Poison.description: Max 10. When the user with this status effect Restores Light, take damage equal to stack and then halve stack on self. Once the user gains this status, it cannot be regained until all the stacks are expired

Slash Power Up.description: Increases power of offensive slash dice.

Blunt Power Up.description: Increases power of offensive blunt dice.

Pierce Power Up.description: Increases power of offensive pierce dice.

Max Dice Power Up.description: For this turn, Dice Max Roll +X

Min Dice Power Up.description: For this turn, Dice Min Roll +X

Bruise.description: All dice lose power equal to stack, every roll lose hp equal to stack

Burn.description: At end of turn, take fixed damage equal to stack. Then reduce count by 1.

Tremor.description: When attacked by skills that cause Tremor Burst, deal stagger damage equal to Potency. If the target is staggered, excess damage lowers maximum SR of the target. At the end of the turn, reduce count by 1.

Rupture.description: When attacked take damage equal to Potency then lower count by 1

Sinking.description: When attacked take (X / 3) stagger damage, then lower count by 1

Bleed.description: When rolling a die take damage equal to Potency then lower count by 1

Gossypium.description: When rolling a die take damage equal to Potency then lower count by 1

Poise.description: crits or sth idk i gave up on the descriptions no one sees them anyways

Pierce Damage Up.description: On Hit: Inflict X bonus damage

Slash Damage Up.description: On Hit: Inflict X bonus damage

Charge Barrier.description:
- Max Stack: 20
- On Hit: Decrease HP and Stagger damage by X, then lower Potency by 1
- Turn Start: Gain X Charge Count next turn, then lose all Potency

Damage Up.description: On Hit: Inflict X bonus damage

Fated Target.description: Used as a resource for the passive "Blind Command"
